```suggestion
requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
```
